data: Last Chance River | Garnier | Parwin | Wrath | Keewatin | Murder Point
John Granger, agent on the Last Chance River in the interests of Garnier, Parwin, and Wrath, independent traders in the territory of Keewatin, sat alone in his store at Murder Point.
Murder Point: A Tale of Keewatin
